title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4602.9 - Members listed on application for license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4602.9 - Members listed on application for license

State Regulations

No person shall be permitted to manage or operate games
of chance unless such person is a bona fide member of the licensee, auxiliary
or affiliate of the licensee and is listed by name and address on the
application for a license that is approved by the
municipality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4602.9

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
